review: Easy set up works great. Searching for movies and apps is quite manageable
author: John S.

review: Awesome! Waiting impatiently for our second one.
author: Lynnfrost

review: Works great.  Exactly what I expected.
author: Tania Gaspar "LUCKYLADY"

review: A great reliable little device. We use it daily.
author: J. Taranto

review: Met all expectations! Very easy to set up and use. Great product!
author: David E Hall

review: You have to subscribe to prime to get anything good
author: tina dillow

review: Easy to set up and use.  Only problem has been my WiFi's occasional weak signal which causes an interruption in viewing.
author: Carolyn S. Devine

review: This is a really cool device!  And with Prime, there is a ton of content to enjoy.  I'm yanking the cable TV and will enjoy commercial-free programming now.
author: bentprong

review: Love this! So easy to set up too. Now I can have my favorite apps plus Netflix and prime movies on my smart tv!
author: Dawn Autry
